### [Industry Employment Trends](https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/bdhgm7il4otepfkvfnbha/AGqGXKnE01AdCsijTKgB5O0?rlkey=9br2ab2wf0nuqxmx87ocehztw&st=xnzi1pt9&dl=0)

The linked Dropbox folder contains the employment trends of all 978 NAICS industry codes.

-   Plot A graphs box-plots of industry employment in each US state as a share of total industry employment across US states for every year where data is available.

-   Plot B graphs box-plots of industry employment in each US state as a share of total state employment for every year where data is available.

-   Plot C graphs box-plots of employment count for every year where data is available.

**Ex. Winery Industry (NAICS 312130)**
